state.memberList: []Address // array with all the recipients of this dividend
state.members: [Address]Int64 // map with all the recipient factors of this dividend
state.owner: AgentID // owner of contract, the only one who can call 'member' func
state.totalFactor: Int64 // sum of all recipient factors

params.owner: ?AgentID // optional owner of contract, defaults to contract creator

member.access: owner // only defined owner of contract can add members

setOwner.access: owner // only defined owner of contract can change owner

params.owner: AgentID // new owner of smart contract
